charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1101_0100_20:
Summoned by Tate, [Name:PlayerNickname ] 
made [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way over to the volcano.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1101_0200_20:
Tate had already arrived and appeared to be
talking to someone on his Poryphone.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_0300_10:
Yes, I know. I’ll be working hard, Liza,
so you should, too.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0401_0700_10:
Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ],
I didn’t realize you were already here.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_0900_10:
Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ],
I didn’t even expect you yet.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_1000_10: I’m guessing you heard that conversation?
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0401_1200_10:
No no! I’m not angry. Really, don’t worry
about it!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_1400_10:
No no! I’m not angry. Really, don’t worry
about it!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_1500_10:
That was my twin, Liza, who I was on the
phone with.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_1600_10:
We’ve split up here on Pasio, 
so we keep in touch by phone.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_2000_10: Well, there is a reason we’re not together.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2100_10:
Up until now, we’ve always been together,
so we took it for granted.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2200_10:
But here on Pasio, there are Trainers and
Pokémon that are totally in sync with each other.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2300_10:
Seeing really tough Trainers who weren’t even
part of a team made us think.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2400_10: We started to wonder why we’re always together.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2500_10:
I mean, of course we are twins, but I felt like
there must be something more to
our combination...
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0302_2800_10: That must’ve been a difficult decision!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_2900_10: It wasn’t too big of a deal.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_3000_10:
This is the first time Liza and I have ever been
apart, so I was a little nervous about it.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3100_10: Solrock is always there for me, though.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3300_10: Having said that, I do feel a bit lonesome.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3400_10: It feels strange to not have anyone to train with.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3500_10:
Hey, that reminds me!
I’ve got an idea, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3700_10:
To be honest, that’s the real reason I asked you
here today. What do you think?
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0301_3800_10: Of course I’ll be your friend!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0302_4000_10: I thought we were already friends?!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_4100_10: I mean, yeah, that’s how I always felt, at least!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4200_10:
Liza and I actually made a promise to each other
when we split up.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4300_10:
Even if we stay split up or we do join
back together...
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4400_10:
we promised each other that we would make it
to the PML and have a Pokémon battle there!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4500_10:
With you as my friend, I think I can fulfill
that promise!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4600_10: I’ll need your help, too, Solrock!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4700_10: The sun and the moon can’t rise together.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4800_10:
But I hope Liza and I find out the real reason we
should be together!
